verses.verse: In you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, do I put my trust <S%H2620><s%>; let me never <S%H408><s%> be ashamed <S%H954><s%>: deliver <S%H6403><s%> me in your righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

Bow down <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> to me <S%H5337><s%>; deliver me speedily <S%H4120><s%>: be you my strong <S%H4581><s%> rock <S%H6697><s%>, for a house <S%H1004><s%> of defense <S%H4686><s%> to save me <S%H3467><s%>.
For you are my rock <S%H5553><s%> and my fortress <S%H4686><s%>; therefore for your name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake lead <S%H5148><s%> me <S%H5095><s%>, and guide me.
Pull me out <S%H3318><s%> of the net <S%H7568><s%> that <S%H2098><s%> they have laid secretly <S%H2934><s%> for me <S%H4581><s%>: for you are my strength.
Into your hand <S%H3027><s%> I commit <S%H6485><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%>: you have redeemed <S%H6299><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord God <S%H410><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%>.
I have hated <S%H8130><s%> them that regard <S%H8104><s%> lying <S%H7723><s%> vanities <S%H1892><s%>: but I trust <S%H982><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

I will be glad <S%H1523><s%> and rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in your mercy <S%H2617><s%>: for you have considered <S%H7200><s%> my trouble <S%H6040><s%>; you have known <S%H3045><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> in adversities <S%H6869><s%>;
And have not shut me up <S%H5462><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%>: you have set <S%H5975><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> in a large room <S%H4800><s%>.

Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, for I am in trouble <S%H6887><s%>: my eye <S%H5869><s%> is consumed <S%H6244><s%> with grief <S%H3708><s%>, Yes <S%H5315><s%>, my soul and my belly <S%H990><s%>.

For my life <S%H2416><s%> is spent <S%H3615><s%> with grief <S%H3015><s%>, and my years <S%H8141><s%> with sighing <S%H585><s%>: my strength <S%H3581><s%> fails <S%H3782><s%> because of my iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and my bones <S%H6106><s%> are consumed <S%H6244><s%>.

I was a reproach <S%H2781><s%> among all my enemies <S%H6887><s%>, but especially <S%H3966><s%> among my neighbors <S%H7934><s%>, and a fear <S%H6343><s%> to my acquaintance <S%H3045><s%>: they that did see <S%H7200><s%> me outside <S%H2351><s%> fled from me <S%H5074><s%>.
I am forgotten <S%H7911><s%> as a dead man <S%H4191><s%> out of mind <S%H3820><s%>: I am like a broken <S%H6><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%>.

For I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the slander <S%H1681><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%>: fear <S%H4032><s%> was on every side <S%H5439><s%>: while they took counsel <S%H3245><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> against me <S%H2161><s%>, they devised to take away <S%H3947><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%>.
But I trusted <S%H982><s%> in you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord: I said <S%H559><s%>, You are my God <S%H430><s%>.
My times <S%H6256><s%> are in your hand <S%H3027><s%>: deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of my enemies <S%H341><s%>, and from them that persecute me <S%H7291><s%>.
Make your face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> upon your servant <S%H5650><s%>: save <S%H3467><s%> me for your mercies <S%H2617><s%>' sake.

Let me not be ashamed <S%H954><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>; for I have called <S%H7121><s%> upon you <S%H7563><s%>: let the wicked be ashamed <S%H954><s%>, and let them be silent <S%H1826><s%> in the grave <S%H7585><s%>.

Let the lying <S%H8267><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> be put to silence <S%H481><s%>; which speak <S%H1696><s%> severe <S%H6277><s%> things proudly <S%H1346><s%> and contemptuously <S%H937><s%> against the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.

Oh how great <S%H7227><s%> is your goodness <S%H2898><s%>, which you have laid up <S%H6845><s%> for them that fear <S%H3373><s%> you <S%H6466><s%>; which you have done for them that trust <S%H2620><s%> in you before the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>!

You shall hide <S%H5641><s%> them in the secret <S%H5643><s%> of your presence <S%H6440><s%> from the pride <S%H7407><s%> of man <S%H376><s%>: you shall keep them secretly <S%H6845><s%> in a pavilion <S%H5521><s%> from the strife <S%H7379><s%> of tongues <S%H3956><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: for he has showed me his marvelous <S%H6381><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> in a strong <S%H4692><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>.

For I said <S%H559><s%> in my haste <S%H2648><s%>, I am cut off <S%H1629><s%> from before <S%H5048><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%>: nevertheless <S%H403><s%> you heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%> when I cried unto you <S%H7768><s%>.

O love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, all you his saints <S%H2623><s%>: for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> preserves <S%H5341><s%> the faithful <S%H539><s%>, and fully <S%H3499><s%> pays back <S%H7999><s%> the arrogant <S%H1346><s%> doer <S%H6213><s%>.
Be of good courage <S%H2388><s%>, and he shall strengthen <S%H553><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%>, all you that hope <S%H3176><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
